headline.print_headline: DuPont to Face First Trial Over C-8 Exposure
headline.main: DuPont to Face First Trial Over C-8 Exposure

docs.lead_paragraph: Chemical giant DuPont Monday will face the first trial in litigation from residents near one of its plants in West Virginia who have accused the company of sickening them by emitting a toxic chemical that leaked into their drinking water.
docs.snippet: Chemical giant DuPont Monday will face the first trial in litigation from residents near one of its plants in West Virginia who have accused the company of sickening them by emitting a toxic chemical that leaked into their drinking water.

headline.print_headline: Fitness Programs Help Campus Rabbis Shape Up
headline.main: Fitness Programs Help Campus Rabbis Shape Up

docs.lead_paragraph: As an Orthodox Jew, Rabbi Moshe Gray may not need a cross. But CrossFit? That's another story.
docs.snippet: As an Orthodox Jew, Rabbi Moshe Gray may not need a cross. But CrossFit? That's another story.

headline.print_headline: In New York, a Win and a Loss on Health
headline.main: In New York, a Win and a Loss on Health

docs.abstract: Editorial praises unanimous New York City Board of Health vote to require fast-food restaurants to post warning labels about very salty items on their menus; criticizes board's decision to stop its crack down on ultra-Orthodox Jewish ritual in which circumciser sucks blood from newly circumcised penis with his mouth, which can infect infants with herpes virus.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Board of Health reached two important decisions, one decent and one that could have dreadful consequences for some infants.
docs.snippet: The Board of Health reached two important decisions, one decent and one that could have dreadful consequences for some infants.

headline.print_headline: Retail Clinics, Apps Change Doctor-Patient Relationship
headline.main: Retail Clinics, Apps Change Doctor-Patient Relationship

docs.lead_paragraph: Tom Coote suspected the stabbing pain in his abdomen was serious, but the harried doctor at the urgent care center suggested it was merely indigestion.
docs.snippet: Tom Coote suspected the stabbing pain in his abdomen was serious, but the harried doctor at the urgent care center suggested it was merely indigestion.

headline.print_headline: Surgeon General Calls for Steps to Promote Healthy Walking
headline.main: Surgeon General Calls for Steps to Promote Healthy Walking

docs.lead_paragraph: Take a walk: That's the U.S. surgeon general's prescription for sedentary Americans — but communities will have to step up, too, and make neighborhoods easier and safer for foot traffic.
docs.snippet: Take a walk: That's the U.S. surgeon general's prescription for sedentary Americans — but communities will have to step up, too, and make neighborhoods easier and safer for foot traffic.

headline.print_headline: Half of US Adults Have Diabetes or Pre-Diabetes, Study Says
headline.main: Half of US Adults Have Diabetes or Pre-Diabetes, Study Says

docs.lead_paragraph: New research suggests that half of all U.S. adults have diabetes or pre-diabetes.
docs.snippet: New research suggests that half of all U.S. adults have diabetes or pre-diabetes.

docs.lead_paragraph: If kids learn good food habits in school, the next generation of adults will be wiser eaters.
docs.snippet: If kids learn good food habits in school, the next generation of adults will be wiser eaters.
